list.name: EXTRA-TOXIC
list.description: Crow's poison saps the strength of enemies, who deal x% less damage while poisoned.
list.descriptionHtml: Crow's poison saps the strength of enemies, who deal x% less damage while poisoned.

list.name: CARRION-CROW
list.description: Crow deals +x% damage with his attack and Super to targets with x% or less health.
list.descriptionHtml: Crow deals +x% damage with his attack and Super to targets with x% or less health.
